description:
Build your own custom Portfolio Website, with E-Commerce - for FREE.

You DO NOT need an expensive "web designer." You can Do It Yourself in just about 2 hours! Jay and Robert make it SIMPLE, with step-by-step instructions!

If you are an Artist or Photographer looking for a gorgeous Portfolio Website - with a shopping cart to sell your work - here is the ultimate budget-conscious solution!

No programming or coding. No need to be a web designer or webmaster.

In a few hours, you can have your own, personalized portfolio website - and start selling your work.

For the past two decades, Jay Jacoby has been teaching, evangelizing and creating inexpensive, high quality websites for clients.

For the past five years, those websites have been built on WordPress, an extraordinarily easy to use and FREE software!
Now, he's showing you how to do it!
Of course, your website will have all the features you'd expect if you would have paid thousands to a web designer â€¦
  • A fantastic slide-show slider to tease visitors into staying on your page
  • A handsome portfolio area to show off all your work that's for sale (or not!)
  • Fully-functional Menus
  • An "About the Artist" page
  • A "Contact Us" page
  • Footer and Icon Services
  • And, a highly functional E-Store set-up, so that you can SELL YOUR WORK

DO NOT WAIT! Within a few hours, you could be selling your artwork or photography on your OWN personalized website!

And, of course, we offer a NO QUESTIONS ASKED 30-day money-back guarantee - as well as our personal promise that this is your best choice on Udemy for building your own portfolio site - for FREE!
title: eCommerce Website, No Coding - DYI Artist/Photo Portfolio
